Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Dashboard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Dashboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStatus
public class Dashboard extends Object implements HasStatus
The dashboard is the access point of the controller to the model. It exposes a function for all of the possible actions a player can perform during a match. Generally, when the action performed goes well, nothing is returned, but if the action violates any of the game rule an exception is thrown.

00000) baseProdInMutable1 (0 = COIN, 1 = SERVANT, 2 = SHIELD, 3 = STONE, 4 = FAITH_MARKER) baseProdInMutable2 (0 = COIN, 1 = SERVANT, 2 = SHIELD, 3 = STONE, 4 = FAITH_MARKER) baseProdOutFixed (always leader) leaderPick3 (same as leader) leaderPick4 (same as leader) SupplyContainer style means that there are 5 integers which represents, in this specific order, the number of: COIN, SERVANT, SHIELD,   • Constructor Details

    • Dashboard

      public Dashboard​(boolean inkwell, Marketplace marketplace, DevelopmentGrid developmentGrid, String name, LeadersList leadersList, boolean isSinglePlayer)
      Creates an empty dashboard specifying if the player is the first one to play, and assign to it the match marketplace and the match development grid.
      Parameters:
      inkwell - is the player the first one to play?
      marketplace - match marketplace, to collect the supplies from
      developmentGrid - match development grid, to buy the development cards from
      name - player nickname
      leadersList -
      isSinglePlayer -

    • Dashboard

      public Dashboard​(int[] status, Marketplace marketplace, DevelopmentGrid developmentGrid, String name, LeadersList leadersList, boolean isSinglePlayer) throws SupplyException, DevelopmentException, LeaderException, NoSuchMethodException
      Creates a dashboard given its status.
      Parameters:
      status - of the dashboard
      name - player nickname
      Throws:
      SupplyException
      DevelopmentException
      LeaderException
      NoSuchMethodException

  • Method Details

    • swapWarehouseRows

      public void swapWarehouseRows​(int r1, int r2) throws SupplyException
      Swaps 2 rows of the Warehouse. If it is not possible a SupplyException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      r1 - row 1
      r2 - row 2
      Throws:
      SupplyException - Cannot swap the 2 rows

    • buySupplies

      public void buySupplies​(MarketDirection dir, int index)
      Transfers the marbles contained in the selected column/row to the user unassigned objects.
      Parameters:
      dir - vertical or horizontal
      index - column or row number

    • getUnassignedSuppliesQuantity

      public int getUnassignedSuppliesQuantity()
      Returns how many non-red marbles are there in the unassigned supplies marble container.
      Returns:
      How many non-red marbles are there in the unassigned supplies marble container.

    • assignMarble

      public void assignMarble​(DepotID to, MarbleColor color) throws SupplyException, MarbleException, NoSuchMethodException, LeaderException
      Transforms a marble into the supply contained in the destination depot. If the transformation is not possible a MarbleException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      to - destination depot
      color - the color of the marble
      Throws:
      SupplyException - Destination is full
      MarbleException - Destination cannot accept this color of marble
      NoSuchMethodException - Leader hasn't a depot ability
      LeaderException

    • transformWhiteMarble

      public void transformWhiteMarble​(MarbleColor newColor) throws MarbleException
      Transforms one of the white marbles in the unassignedSupplies container to the specified color.
      Parameters:
      newColor - Color to transform the white marble to.
      Throws:
      MarbleException - No white marbles left or there isn't an active leader to perform the conversion.

    • discardSupplies

      public Pair<Integer,​Boolean> discardSupplies()
      Discards all the remaining marbles in the unassigned supply container. If the marble is red, then the player goes ahead one tile on the faith track. For each non-red discarded marble, all of the other player go ahead one tile on the faith track.
      Returns:
      How many non-red marbles are discarded. Does the player triggered a vatican report?

    • moveSupply

      public void moveSupply​(DepotID from, DepotID to, WarehouseObjectType type) throws SupplyException, NoSuchMethodException, LeaderException
      Moves a supply of the specified type from the from container to the to container. The ID number of the containers is as follows: 0 warehouse 1, 1 warehouse 2, 2 warehouse 3, 3 development 1, 4 development 2, 5 development 3, 6 leader 1, 7 leader 2 In case of any error, the resource is not moved and a SupplyException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      from - Source container
      to - Destination container
      type - Type of resource to move
      Throws:
      SupplyException - Thrown if the source doesn't have the specified type of resource, or if the destination cannot accept the resource
      NoSuchMethodException
      LeaderException

    • trustedAddSupply

      public void trustedAddSupply​(DepotID warehouseSlot, WarehouseObjectType type) throws SupplyException
      Adds a resource to a warehouse slot. Used at the beginning of the match to add the starting resources.
      Parameters:
      warehouseSlot - Where to add the supply
      type - Type of the supply to add
      Throws:
      SupplyException - Couldn't add the supply to the specified slot

    • produce

      public boolean produce​(boolean s1, boolean s2, boolean s3, boolean l1, boolean l2, boolean base)
      Activates production in the specified production spaces, and stores the output in the coffer.
      Parameters:
      s1 - Development space 1
      s2 - Development space 2
      s3 - Development space 3
      l1 - Leader 1 production (if leader 1 has that ability)
      l2 - Leader 2 production (if leader 2 has that ability)
      base - Production of the board
      Returns:
      Returns if a vatican report has been issued as a result of the production of faith markers

    • checkProduction

      public void checkProduction​(boolean s1, boolean s2, boolean s3, boolean l1, boolean l2, boolean base) throws SupplyException
      Checks if there is the exact number of supplies placed on the active production spaces in order to produce.
      Parameters:
      s1 - Development space 1
      s2 - Development space 2
      s3 - Development space 3
      l1 - Leader 1 production (if leader 1 has that ability)
      l2 - Leader 2 production (if leader 2 has that ability)
      base - Production of the board
      Throws:
      SupplyException - Thrown if in at least one supply space there isn't the correct amount of resources

    • buyDevelopment

      public void buyDevelopment​(int column, int row, int space) throws SupplyException, DevelopmentException, NoSuchCardException
      Tries to buy the card in the specified space of the grid, and places it in the specified development space on the dashboard.
      Parameters:
      column - column of the selected card in the grid
      row - row of the selected card in the grid
      space - development space where to place the card
      Throws:
      SupplyException - There isn't the exact number of supplies in the paycheck to buy the card
      DevelopmentException - You cannot place the card you want to buy in the specified development space
      NoSuchCardException - The space in the grid you selected contains no cards

    • buyableDevelopmentLevels

      public ArrayList<Integer> buyableDevelopmentLevels()
      Returns the levels of the development card the player can buy
      Returns:
      the levels of the development card the player can buy

    • fillLeadersPicks

      public void fillLeadersPicks()
      Fills the leaders pick object with 4 random leaders

    • fillLeadersPicksWithList

      public void fillLeadersPicksWithList​(ArrayList<LeaderCard> list)
      Fills the leaders pick object with 4 given leaders.

    • pickLeader

      public void pickLeader​(int index) throws LeaderException
      Pick the specified leader among the 4 leaders picks.
      Parameters:
      index - What leader to pick
      Throws:
      LeaderException - 2 Leaders added yet.

    • addLeader

      @Deprecated public void addLeader​(LeaderCard leader) throws LeaderException
      Deprecated.
      Adds the specified leader to the leader space
      Parameters:
      leader - The leader to add
      Throws:
      LeaderException - There is already the maximum number of leaders (2)

    • discardLeader

      public boolean discardLeader​(int i) throws LeaderException
      Discards the specified leader and goes ahead one tile on the faith track
      Parameters:
      i - which leader
      Returns:
      Returns if a vatican report has been issued
      Throws:
      LeaderException - The specified leader cannot be discarded (already discarded or active)

    • playLeader

      public void playLeader​(int i) throws SupplyException, LeaderException
      Activates the specified leader.
      Parameters:
      i - Leader to activate
      Throws:
      SupplyException - Leader activation requirements aren't matched
      LeaderException - The specified leader cannot be played (already discarded or active)

    • goAhead

      public boolean goAhead()
      Moves the player one tile ahead in the faith track.
      Returns:
      Returns if a vatican report has been issued

    • goAheadDontTrigger

      public boolean goAheadDontTrigger()
      Moves the player one tile ahead in the faith track.
      Returns:
      true a vatican report needs to be issued

    • vaticanReport

      public void vaticanReport()
      Triggers a vatican report.

    • swapBaseProduction

      public void swapBaseProduction​(int i, WarehouseObjectType wot) throws SupplyException
      Swaps one of the mutable inputs/outputs of the base production.
      Parameters:
      i - 0 = first input, 1 = second input, 2 = output
      wot - new supply to insert
      Throws:
      SupplyException - A faith marker or no type supply type was added

    • swapLeaderProduction

      public void swapLeaderProduction​(int i, WarehouseObjectType wot) throws SupplyException, NoSuchMethodException, LeaderException
      Swaps the only mutable output in the specified leader
      Parameters:
      i - number of leader
      wot - new supply to insert
      Throws:
      SupplyException - A no type supply type was added
      NoSuchMethodException - Specified leader is not a Producer
      LeaderException - Specified leader is not active or is discarded

    • clearDepot

      public void clearDepot​(DepotID id) throws NoSuchMethodException
      Clears the specified depot, and reinsert the cleared supplies to their source.
      Parameters:
      id - depot to clear
      Throws:
      NoSuchMethodException - tried to clear a non Depot or Producer leader

    • clearProductions

      public void clearProductions()
      Clears all of the production depots, and reinsert the cleared supplies to their source.

    • clearPaycheck

      public void clearPaycheck()
      Clears the paycheck, and reinsert the cleared supplies to their source.

      If the current dashboard belongs to the player who started the match

    • giveInkwell

      public void giveInkwell()
      Assigns the inkwell to the player

    • isMatchEnded

      public boolean isMatchEnded()
      Checks if the match ended, so if the player got to the last tile in the faith track or id he bought at least 7 development cards.
      Returns:
      If the player triggered an end match condition.

    • getAllowedDepots

      public ArrayList<DepotID> getAllowedDepots​(DepotID from, WarehouseObjectType type)
      Returns the depots that can receive the specified supply.
      Parameters:
      from - Source of the supply
      type - Type of the supply
      Returns:
      The depots that can receive the specified supply

    • extractActionTile

      public boolean extractActionTile()
      Extracts one tile from the stack, and performs the associated action.
      Returns:
      True if the match is ended, so if the black cross finished the faith track or if all the cards of one color are gone.

    • vaticanReportSP

      public void vaticanReportSP​(int position)
      Triggers a vatican report for the single player match.
      Parameters:
      position - the black cross position

    • extractActionTileWithIndex

      public boolean extractActionTileWithIndex​(int index)
      Extract one tile from the stack given an index, and performs the associated action.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the tile to extract
      Returns:
      True if the match is ended, so if the black cross finished the faith track or if all the cards of one color are gone.

    • findIndex

      private int findIndex​(int[] status, int number)
      Finds the index of the leader pick corresponding to the chosen player's leader (1 or 2)
      Parameters:
      status - array representing the status of the dashboard
      number - index of the leader card of the player (1 or 2)
      Returns:
      the index of the leader pick
